## Checklist
- [ ] Builds locally
- [ ] CI is green
- [ ] `cargo fmt --all -- --check`
- [ ] `cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets -- -D warnings`
- [ ] `cargo test --workspace`

- [ ] UX change includes screenshot/GIF (if applicable)
